page.title: 09THE NEWSHEET OF KNEESALL,2
page.content: In the most recent edition of the village newsheet,they have put an item about the{Domesday Project}and what Kneesall School are contributing.A typical list of items for each month's copy might include a religious article, news about the village fete,prizewinners in the village competitions and forthcoming social events. Mrs Ricket types the carbon sheets each month. She types quickly and then the sheets are duplicated. Later,the finished newsheet is distributed from house to house in {Kneesall, Kersall {and Ompton }while a single copy is sent to the churches in the neighbouring villages. The newsheet is very interesting and has lots of variety.The editors of the Kneesall Knatter certainly make it very lively.
